brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to test individual donor samples (IDSs) with the
      investigational Dengue Assay on the TIGRIS System and to further characterize the Dengue
      Assay in the clinical setting.

clinical_study.brief_title: Procleix® Dengue Virus Assay Testing of Individual Donor Samples From Puerto Rican and US Blood Donors - CTS

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Donor must meet all the blood collection sites' standard eligibility requirements.

          -  Donor and/or legally authorized representative must be willing to undergo the site's
             routine informed consent process prior to study participation.

study_pop.textblock: volunteer blood donors from the US and Puerto Rico

clinical_study.official_title: Procleix® Dengue Virus Assay Testing of Individual Donor Samples From Puerto Rican and US Blood Donors - Creative Testing Solutions

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Qualitative detection of ribosomal RNA from Dengue Virus in plasma specimens from individual human donors, including volunteer donors of whole blood and blood components, and other living donors.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
